column2: Chris Brown & Lil Wayne & French Montana Too Short Or Tyga's Loyal
A drunk variant of the Joulouville. As rich as Chris Brown & Lil Wayne & French Montana Too Short Or Tyga's game.
Gin, Applejack and a hint of something.
Chris Brown & Lil Wayne & French Montana Too Short Or Tyga have it with a rich Porterhouse steak with mushrooms and stollen.
Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the loyal sounds of Loyal.
